original_text: The Lord visited Sarah as he had said, and the Lord did to Sarah as he had promised.
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하신 대로 사라를 돌보셨고 여호와께서 말씀하신 대로 사라에게 행하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: The Lord visited Sarah as he had said
and the Lord did to Sarah as he had promised
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님께서 약속하신 대로 사라에게 행하셨습니다
